title: Break a champion of your choice, whether he becomes unplayable or god tier.
body:
Unplayable:
Yasuo's E has a 1 sec cooldown between uses.

God Tier:
Yasuo can attack during his ultimate, also wind wall moves to block projectiles.

replies.body:
Unplayable: Vayne- is that even possible?

GodTier: Vayne gets +3 ad

Hmmmm{{champion:412}} 
Unplayable:
Mana costs are doubled
God Tier:
All the walls of his ultimate deal damage.
But they do deal damage? :O
Only the first one that breaks
Broken:  Numbers on par with other champs in his role. ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Annie:
Unplayable: only using her ult generates passive stacks
God tier: only needs 3 spells to stun.

Pfff

first of all, you don't know how to make yasuo god tier or unplayable

i shall correct you for the yassubrotherhood

Unplayable:

Yasuo Crit chance damage  decreased to 25%

God Tier:

Yasuo Q has 300% AD ratio instead of 100%

{{champion:45}}
**Unplayable:**
His season 5 rework

**God Tier:**
His season 5 rework after it got buffed

Mordekaiser -> God tier
( according to Riot)

Base Movement speed +10

{{champion:69}} 
Unplayable:
Her E always has a 3 sec cd

God-Tier
She has no cd on her E like, actually 00.00

> [{quoted}](name=Jargon Wan,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kndpcyet,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-12-25T16:36:06.726+0000)
>
> {{champion:69}} 
> Unplayable:
> Her E always has a 3 sec cd


They removed the increased cooldown on her E in 6.9, now It's ALWAYS 1 second cd
0.75 at all ranks... I play her a lot, making it 3 sec at all ranks would make her useless xDDDDDDD
True but I thought you didn't know/ forgot it was changed, my bad :3
nope lul

> [{quoted}](name=FormationX,realm=EUNE,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kndpcyet,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-12-25T11:20:50.896+0000) 
> God Tier:
> Yasuo can attack during his ultimate, also wind wall moves to block projectiles.

Don't even joke about this.
both unplayable and broken: tali walls dont expire
{{champion:122}} : Q heal now heals for the same percent of his max health. Bleed now deals true damage.

**Unplayable**

{{champion:103}} Can only stack her passive on Champion hits 
{{champion:61}} 's Ball can only stick to champions or minions
{{champion:53}}'s Ultimate also silences allies

**God Tier**

{{champion:103}} has infinite dashes with her ultimate in the 10 seconds 
{{champion:61}} 's Q now moves the ball like {{summoner:4}} 
{{champion:53}}'s Q can only grab champions

Unplayable: The only way for {{champion:122}} to stack his passive is with his ultimate.

God Tier: Every victim {{champion:122}} dunks globally spreads 5 stacks of his passive to all enemy champions.

{{champion:143}} 

Passive will always deposit at least two seeds randomly.  Seeds no longer expire unless stepped on.  No maximum.
Q now deals damage in the entire range of it's "awakening" range.
W now stacks to 4 with half cooldown.
E now deals damage and snares in it's entire "awakening" range, and travels at the speed of Blitzcrank's hook.
R will now awaken seeds in it's radius into Thornspitter Plants and enrage them.

"This land is mine."
